posts.post_title: SALE: Miller Huggins / Jack Warhop Sovereign T206
posts.post_content:
I have the following T206's for sale.  All prices include shipping and paypal gift is appreciated.

Miller Huggins hands at mouth piedmont g+ $46

Jack Warhop batting sovereign exmt (trimmed, looks Near Mint.) $36
[IMG]http://i1211.photobucket.com/albums/cc434/tolstoi1/20140927_154513_zpse6f49046.jpg[/IMG]

I'll take the Speaker. Email sent through Net54. Thank you. Please email me with payment info: [url]trae@t206.org[/url]
Email sent on Bender, Kelley and Willis.
